# Avinash (alvs.dev)

Frontend web developer based in India, building web applications with Next.js, TypeScript, and modern tooling. Currently freelancing and exploring full-stack development.

## About

I build focused web projects to learn and solve real problems. Passionate about open source, clean code, and shipping over endless polish. Currently diving deeper into backend (Bun, Hono, Cloudflare) while maintaining frontend expertise.

## Core Stack

- Frontend: Next.js, TypeScript, React, Astro, Tailwind CSS
- Backend/Tools: Supabase, Clerk, Vercel, PostHog, Biome
- Learning: Bun, Hono, Cloudflare Workers
